answer: Multiple vaccines can be given at the same clinic visit. Research has shown that getting multiple vaccines at the same time is safe and that there is no increased risk in side effects and that vaccines work just as well when given together.
answer_formatted:
## Multiple vaccines can be given at the same clinic visit.

Research has shown that getting multiple vaccines at the same time is safe and that there is no increased risk in side effects and that vaccines work just as well when given together.
question: How many vaccines can you get in one visit to the doctor? (Example DTP and MMR vaccinations during one visit)
question_variation_0: how many shots can you need in one doctor visit
question_variation_1: how many shots can you get with one visit to doctor
question_variation_2: how many vaccinations can you get in one visit to a doctor
